My CLI Workflow

page-type

Workflow

Between Linux, WSL2, and macOS, my command line workflow tends to be pretty consistent regardless of how My Desktop Workflow looks today.

I still try out new tools routinely, but the core and maybe one more layer out from that — those are consistent.

Tools

Core

I don’t feel ready for work until I have these set up.

GNU Bash

Neovim

Starship

Git

Python

Perl

tmux

keychain

Stable

I can work without them, but I won’t be happy about it.
